attributes.action: Increase the amount of help given to the old age during the winter
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After seeing a Dispatchers programme "Heat or Eat" on More 4. It has become clear the help given to OAPs is not enough. With the increasing fuel bills and council cut backs. it has become almost impossible for pensioners to be able to pay their fuel bills. Our fuel rates are among the highest in Europe. We should trat our elderly with the respect they deserve.
